person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: There is the international prestige Singapore would enjoy , but " more importantly there is a genuine national interest in fostering better global free trade and an open market " , said Tan Kong Yam , head of Business Policy at the National University of Singapore .

Let's think step by step.

The "Person" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Tan Kong Yam
2. National University of Singapore (this is an organization, but it is mentioned as the place where Tan Kong Yam holds a position, so it can be considered a "Person" entity in this context)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Sure, my apologies for the mistake. Here are the "Person" entities in the paragraph after removing irrelevant entities:

1. Tan Kong Yam

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid "Person" entities in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table:

| Person |
| --- |
| Tan Kong Yam |
